knimeNode.name: Function View
knimeNode.shortDescription: Plots a fitted simple scalar function with data.

fullDescription.intro: Plots a fitted simple scalar function with data.

tab.name: Display Options
tab.option: If checked, a legend is shown below the chart.
If checked, the data points in the chart are connected by lines.
If checked, the confidence interval for the function is shown. This interval can only be computed, when the covariance matrix of the parameters is provided.
If checked, the a SVG (vector graphic) chart is generated by this node. Otherwise a PNG chart is generated.
Number of points, that are evaluated for each function to draw the graph.

tab.name: Range
tab.option: If checked, the lower left corner of the chart is set to (0/0).
If checked, the ranges of the chart can be manually set via "Min X", "Max X", "Min Y", "Max Y". Otherwise the ranges are set automatically.

tab.name: Variables
tab.option: Optional transformation of the x-Axis variable.
Optional transformation of the y-Axis variable.

ports.inPort: Data to be plotted with the function.
Covariance matrix of the parameters (needed for computing the confidence interval).
